attributes.description: Acquire the pre-owned vehicle of your dreams at Buffalo Toyota Mthatha. We stock all models of affordable Automark options at prices that will keep you completely satisfied. Our Sales team are committed to assisting you at every step of the way so please give us a call and enquire about any additional Toyota approved extras – we are only too happy to assist you to drive away proudly in your vehicle of choice. Finance and extended warranties available. Vehicle pictures may vary from original car

attributes.description: All about the drive! Features include: Engine power output: 85Kw/148Nm - Electronic power assist steering; 16 inch alloy wheels; LED headlamps with auto on/off function; Front rain-sensing wipers; Advanced keyless push-button engine start; Smart advanced keyless entry; Trip computer; 6 Airbags SRS: Front (driver and passenger, side and curtain); Dynamic Stability Assist (DBS); Anti-lock Braking System (ABS); Electronic Brake-force Distribution (EBD); Emergency Brake Assist (EBA); Power windows (front and rear); Leather and cloth combination seat trim; Leather-wrapped: steering wheel; gearshift knob and handbrake handle; Cruise Control; Auto dimming rear-view mirror; Auto fold mirrors; Auto paddle transmission switches Height adjustable seat – Driver; Rear seat with 60/40 fold backrest; Bluetooth handsfree connection; Aircon; Multifunctional steering wheel with audio controls; Tilt and telescopic adjustable steering wheel; Radio - CD player/AUX jack/2 USB connectivity ports; 6 Speakers; MZD Connect system; 7-Inch display; Commander dial; Apple CarPlay™ and Android Auto™; Internet radio integration (Pandora®, Sticher and AHA); Power windows one-touch system (driver); Remote central locking; Reverse Camera; Parking sensors rear; Chrome bumper strips and exhaust extension; Shark fin antenna; ISOFIX. EURO NCAP 5-STAR SAFETY RATING The vehicle has a 3 year / unlimited mileage Warranty 3 year / unlimited mileage Service Plan as well as Roadside Assistance

attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.
